
# Round

Module to use with any generic abilities script, allow to precise control of the round and syncing of abilities.

**The default speed is now x2 instead of x1.**

## Controls

- Pauses the round automatically when starting or restarting the round.
- Use the sequence "00" to enable round management
- If round management is on:
  - Use the sequence "09" to pause/unpause
  - Use the sequence "08" to switch between 2x and 1x speed
  - Use the sequence "06" to advance the round one frame at a time
  
## Requirements
  
- [Common execution stack](/common/execution_stack)
- [Key sequence detector](/common/key_events)
  
## Import codes

### New round

`CW5ldyByb3VuZAEAAAANZ2FtZS5uZXdyb3VuZAAAAAABAAAADmdsb2JhbC5pbnQuc2V0CGNvbnN0YW50BA9uZXdfcm91bmRfY3ljbGUOZ2xvYmFsLmludC5nZXQIY29uc3RhbnQEDWN5Y2xlX2NvdW50ZXI=`
